CommandDefinition.Name: configuretriggermaxevents
CommandDefinition.Description: Set maximum number of events processed concurrently by one trigger instance.

Argument.Name: triggerInstanceName
Argument.Description: The trigger that will be limited.

Argument.Name: maxEvents
Argument.Description: The maximum number of events processed at a time. Set to -1 to deactivate feature.

BoolOption.Name: a
BoolOption.Description: If this optional flag is set, all events exceeding the maximum number will be rejected promptly. Otherwise the trigger instance will not generate more events (e.g. underlying socket buffer fills up or queue will not be drain).
